title: Opioid tapering may improve outcomes for chronic pain sufferers

title_detail.value: Opioid tapering may improve outcomes for chronic pain sufferers

summary: Dose reduction may improve pain, function, and quality of life for patients prescribed long-term opioid therapy for chronic pain, report researchers.

summary_detail.value: Dose reduction may improve pain, function, and quality of life for patients prescribed long-term opioid therapy for chronic pain, report researchers.
